word_mean: 认识论：有关认识方法和真实性的科学

sentence.Network_en: Epistemology is the theory of knowledge.
sentence.Network_cn: 认识论是关于认识的理论.

sentence.Network_en: Traditionally, philosophy has been partitioned into three areas: epistemology, metaphysics, and value theory.
sentence.Network_cn: 哲学在传统上分为三个领域: 认识论 、 形而上学和价值理论.

sentence.Network_en: What kind of 15 year - old reads Buddhist epistemology?
